name: extrude
desc: Accepts surfaces, lines, or points and adds one to the dimensionality of the input by extruding the mesh in the Z direction.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Extrude By
properties.desc: The Extrude By control allows the user to handle the method of extrusion.

properties.name: Constant Value
properties.desc: If the Extrude By selection is set to Constant the Constant Value will be the height of each cell.

properties.name: Cell Data Component
properties.desc: If the Extrude By selection is set to Cell Data Component, the data component of interest can be selected using this control.

properties.name: Node Data Component
properties.desc: If the Extrude By selection is set to Node Data Component, the data component of interest can be selected using this control.

properties.name: Limit Extrusion
properties.desc: If the Extrude By selection is set to Node Data Component,  you must select 'Positive Extrusions' or 'Negative Extrusions'. Since each node of a triangle or quadrilateral can have different values, it is possible for a single cell to have both positive and negative data values at its nodes. If this type of cell is extruded both directions, the cell topology can become tangled.

properties.name: Subdivisions
properties.desc: The Subdivisions field determines how many cells vertically to create.

properties.name: Scale Factor
properties.desc: The Scale Factor is multiplied by the selected Extrude By value to determine the extrude height.

properties.name: Heading Dip Value
properties.desc: The Heading and Dip values are used to align the extruded points.
